objects.text:
• Spinning palm tree & leaf bed
• Relaxing hammock for kitties
• Includes 2 cats & accessories

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a children's toy advertisement designed with a playful and vibrant aesthetic. The layout is split vertically, with the left half featuring a fun pink gradient background adorned with soft circular bubbles and flowing white curves. On this side, bold white text elements include a main title (`heading`), a subheading (`subheading`), descriptive bullet points (`description`), and a large price tag (`price`). Below that is a rectangular white button containing call-to-action text (`cta`) in bright pink. The right side of the banner shows the product image (`product_image`) — a colorful kitty playset. The background includes smooth gradient transitions to enhance visual appeal. 

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Pink (Left Background): `#FFB6C1` to `#FF69B4`
- Soft Pink (Right Background): `#FFF0F5` to `#FFE4E1`
- White Text and Elements: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Pink (Call-to-action text and elements): `#FF1493`
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and playful color palette ideal for creating an advertisement targeted toward children. Dominant colors include bright pink (#EF4AA5) used for the cat house, symbolizing energy and excitement. Aqua green (#3AB284) found in the base grass and palm leaves blends harmoniously with natural tan (#F2C79B) trunks and floor, grounding the design with a sandy tropical feel. Accents like lavender purple (#B38EDD), sky blue (#46C5DA), and red-pink (#E72961) are sprinkled throughout to add charm and visual interest. These colors are distinctly separated yet blend cohesively, emphasizing playfulness while keeping each element well-highlighted.
